text: Nyasaye shanichilisinjia omundu yesiyesi halali khushichelo shianyalilwa. Obukhala bwa kayakhola nobubwe, ne okhusikha khwa kayakhola ni okhukhwe, â€œNyasaye wefu omulesi olakhubukilila nikhwibilila nohomba nikhwisikirasia tawe, Nyasaye wefu omulesi, olakhutukha emisiko shinga echawatukha balia abali imbeli wefu tawe. Nyasaye wefu omulesi olakhutukha akakhulanyala tawe, ne okhubeele ne okhuleshele ne okhubeele tsimbabaasi, Newe omulindi wefu, kho khuhelesie obushili khushile omukanda kwabakhayi
